metadata.title: CVE-2021-23963 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When sharing geolocation during an active WebRTC share, Firefox could havereset the webRTC sharing state in the user interface, leading to loss ofcontrol over the currently granted permission. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 85.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
